title: New: Cameron Crook – You
body:
Describing his style as “ramshackle”, Manchester based electronic artist Cameron Crook put a new song up on his Soundcloud an hour ago.

You is dark and droning, somewhat reminiscent of Four Tet and Boards of Canada. In classic Crook style the track is driven by echoed samples and spatial beats.

Let this one wash over you like a lightning storm on a summer evening.

You can find Cameron’s latest four track EP over on [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/cmrntcrk "Cameron Crook's Soundcloud") or download a track from his 2011 album The Nettle Patch, [here](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9777-introducing-mpfree-cameron-crook/).

photo credit: [Roozbeh Rokni](http://www.flickr.com/photos/roozbeh11/3806951134/) via [photopin](http://photopin.com) [cc](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/2.0/)
